mapper.title: Add a concept
mapper.description: Click "ADD CONCEPT" to add a concept for your new course.

mapper.title: Open course tray
mapper.description: Click the floating arrow button to open the course tray. The course tray lets you choose courses that are prerequisites for the current course.

mapper.title: Create another course
mapper.description: Create a new course that is a prerequisite for the course you created first.

mapper.title: Mark a course as a prerequisite
mapper.description: Add a course to the prerequisites of the current course by clicking the checkbox next to the course name in the course tray.

mapper.title: Add a concept to the new course
mapper.description: Add a concept to the newly created prerequisite course.

mapper.title: Start drawing a link to a prerequisite
mapper.description: Click a right-pointing triangle to start drawing a link to a prerequisite concept.

mapper.title: Link to a prerequisite concept
mapper.description: Click a left-pointing triangle to create the link.

mapper.title: Focus a concept
mapper.description: Click on a concept to focus it and highlight links from it.

mapper.title: Delete a link between concepts
mapper.description: Click the link and click "DELETE" in the context menu to delete the link.

mapper.title: Switch to the graph view
mapper.description: The graph view is a read-only view of your workspace, with all the courses and links.

mapper.title: Switch to the heatmap view
mapper.description: The heatmap view lets you see how strongly courses are connected by showing the number of concept links as a heat map.
